N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 973.5 - Notification of determination by Department of Transportation

State Regulations

Upon receipt of responses from all of the notified
agencies and authorities or expiration of the stipulated date, the Department
of Transportation shall evaluate all replies received from the agencies and
authorities contacted and determine either to exercise the preferential right
of acquisition itself, authorize one or more agencies or authorities to
exercise the right, or issue a release. All agencies and authorities contacted
shall be informed of the decision for disposition of the property by the
department. (a) In the event that the
department decides to exercise the preferential right of acquisition itself, it
shall so advise the railroad company in writing. (b) In the event that the department
determines that one or more agencies should be authorized to exercise the
preferential right, it shall prepare, execute and forward to the railroad
company and the appropriate agencies an assignment and authorization indicating
the agencies or authorities so authorized. (c) In the event that the department
determines that it will not exercise the preferential acquisition right and
that it will not authorize any other agency or authority to do so, it shall so
inform the railroad company. Upon receipt of this notification, the railroad
company shall transmit to the Director, Real Estate Division, New York State

Department of Transportation, Building 5, State Campus, Albany, New York 12232
a recordable description of the property to be released so that the department
can prepare a formal release of the preferential right and have it recorded in
the office of the county clerk of the county in which such property is
located. Notes
